eg

Class Projects

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.Projects

  • public class Projects
extends java.lang.Object
    The assigned projects.

    A project is represented by an object of ProjectActions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Projects(MainWin mw, EditableDocument[] edtDoc) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignProject(ProjectTypes projType)
      Assigns a new project
      void buildProj()
      Creates a build of the currently active project
      void changeProject()
      Changes to the project which the currently selected EditableDocument belongs to
      void openSettingsWindow()
      Opens the window of the SettingsWindow object that belongs to a project.
      void retrieveProject()
      Tries to retrieve a project whose configuration is saved in an 'eadproject' file in the project folder or, if such file is not existent, in the program's prefs file.
      void runProject()
      Runs the currently active project
      void saveAllAndCompile()
      Saves all open files of the currently active project and compiles the project
      void saveAndCompile()
      Saves the selected file of the currently active project and compiles the project
      void setDocumentAt(int i)
      Selects an element from this array of EditableDocument by the specified index
      void updateFileTree()
      Updates the file tree if the selected EditableDocument belongs to the currently active project

      • assignProject

        public void assignProject(ProjectTypes projType)
        Assigns a new project
        Parameters:
        projType - the project type which has a valaue in ProjectTypes

      • retrieveProject

        public void retrieveProject()
        Tries to retrieve a project whose configuration is saved in an 'eadproject' file in the project folder or, if such file is not existent, in the program's prefs file.
        See Also:
        AbstractProject.retrieveProject(String)

      • openSettingsWindow

        public void openSettingsWindow()
        Opens the window of the SettingsWindow object that belongs to a project.

        Depending on the currently set EditableDocument the window belongs to the currently active project or to one of this listed projects.

      • changeProject

        public void changeProject()
        Changes to the project which the currently selected EditableDocument belongs to

      • updateFileTree

        public void updateFileTree()
        Updates the file tree if the selected EditableDocument belongs to the currently active project

      • saveAndCompile

        public void saveAndCompile()
        Saves the selected file of the currently active project and compiles the project

      • saveAllAndCompile

        public void saveAllAndCompile()
        Saves all open files of the currently active project and compiles the project

      • runProject

        public void runProject()
        Runs the currently active project

      • buildProj

        public void buildProj()
        Creates a build of the currently active project
